title: Windows 8.1 Extreme Edition (x86/x64)
description:
Windows 8.1 Extreme Edition

Based on Windows 8.1 Pro VL NOT ACTIVATED

System is 5X FASTER than Original Windows 8.1

Optimized for SSD Disks!

Immediately visible difference!

Try it Yourself :)

---------------------------------------

Changes from the original:

- Added DotNet. Framework

- Added DirectX

- Integrated new updates

- Added Aero (you can uninstall)

- Added HashCheck

- Added 7-zip

- Integrated apps like GPU-Z,CPU-Z,Rufus etc.

- Now You can use stranger themes

- In the context menu You can find Explorer 8.1/7 Changer

- Purged and compressed "winsxs" folder

- Deleted "Tablet"

- Deleted "Support speech recognition"

- Deleted "Windows Store"

- Deleted "Easy Transfer"

- Deleted "WMC"

- Deleted some features of "Mobile PC"

---------------------------------------

IMPORTANT!!!

System default is installed as Polish

In the folder with download You can find how to change language!

After first install go to the "Pierwszy Krok" folder and install "Start is Back"!


PLEASE SEED WHEN YOU FINISH DOWNLOADING!
